channel.title: KageTenshi is a Tier 3!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "KageTenshi is a Tier 3!" - We have 135 upgrades at the moment and we are Tier 3. Come join!

item.title: Re: KageTenshi is a Tier 3!
item.content:encoded: We are an Immortal Realm and have 135 upgrades. We are only missing the 55 villager uprades, spire, and the major kaiju. Once i get more villagers, i will begin to summon the major kaiju. We summon hard zombja maps, summon daily if my invaders invade, and we are R00t. Recently we have become a Tier 3 village and we are the lowest villager count village to do so with just 21. Come join today!
